meanings.definition: In a manner that causes severe physical or mental impairment.
meanings.sent1: She moved cripplingly slow after her injury.
meanings.sent2: The fear of heights cripplingly affected her ability to climb the ladder.
meanings.sent3: The cat cripplingly tried to fit into the tiny box.
meanings.sent4: The storm cripplingly paralyzed the city with fear.
meanings.sent5: The darkness enveloped her cripplingly, making her feel trapped.

meanings.definition: To an extent that severely hinders or limits something.
meanings.sent1: The high cost of living cripplingly impacted their ability to save money.
meanings.sent2: The lack of resources cripplingly restricted their progress.
meanings.sent3: The tangled wires cripplingly tangled up the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The heavy workload cripplingly weighed down on the employees.
meanings.sent5: The thick fog cripplingly obscured their view of the road ahead.
